ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( NSSales_Internal_User__c ) ) , OR( NOT( ISBLANK( NSSales_Non_Connect_NS_User__c ) ) , NOT( ISBLANK( NSSale_Non_Connect_NS_User_Email_Address__c ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( NSSale_Non_Connect_NS_User_Phone_Number__c ) ),NOT( ISBLANK( NSSales_Non_Connect_NS_User_Role__c ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only add either a Internal ConnectNS User OR a Non-ConnectNS User
